parameters.name: AnycastId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Anycast EIP.

> You must specify **Ip** or **AnycastId**.

parameters.name: BindInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint with which the Anycast EIP is associated.

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description:
The IP address of the Anycast EIP.

> You must specify **Ip** or **AnycastId**.
